resources.string: vectorcamapp
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
The request timed out. Please check your connection and try again.
You have made too many requests in a short period. Please wait and try again later.
No internet connection. Please check your network settings and try again.
An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
There was an issue processing the response. Please contact support if this continues.
This session hasn\'t been marked as complete yet.
The requested item could not be found.
Thereâ€™s already an existing item with the same ID.
The request was invalid. Please check your input and try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
Collector title is required.
Collector name is required.
District is required.
Sentinel site is required.
House number is required.
LLIN type is required when LLINs are available.
LLIN brand is required when LLINs are available.
Collection date cannot be in the future.
Collection method is required.
Specimen condition is required.
Could not take the photo. Please try again.
Could not save the photo. Please try again.
Could not process the photo. Please try again.
No specimen found in the photo. Please try again with a clearer image.
Multiple specimens detected. Please make sure exactly one specimen is in frame.
No active session found. Please start a new session before capturing images.
App could not load its brain. Try restarting the app.
Your device may not support faster image analysis. The app will still work, but may be slower.
Something went wrong while preparing the session. Please restart or contact support.
The app ran into a problem analyzing the image. Please retake the photo.
Could not read the specimen ID. Make sure the label is clear and well-lit.
Could not detect a specimen in the image. Try taking a clearer photo.
An unknown error occurred during analysis. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please contact support if this issue persists.
Some of the information you entered was invalid or already exists. Please check and try again.
An unknown error occurred while saving data. Please contact support if this issue persists.
Unable to load device information. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
Site not found for selected district and sentinel site.
Program ID is missing. Please contact support.
Permission error. Please enable location access in settings.
GPS Timeout. Please move to a different location and try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
Program not found. Please contact support.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
Session not found. Please try again.
Unable to retrieve session. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
Could not load session details. Please try again.
Could not load site details. Please try again.
Could not load surveillance form details. Please try again.
Could not load specimens. Please try again.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
